thread.title: BRIEF-Insys Says Working With Authorities To Resolve Issues Related To "Inappropriate Actions" Taken By Former Employees​

title: BRIEF-Insys Says Working With Authorities To Resolve Issues Related To "Inappropriate Actions" Taken By Former Employees​
text: March 19, 2018 / 12:28 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Insys Says Working With Authorities To Resolve Issues Related To "Inappropriate Actions" Taken By Former Employees​ Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - Insys Therapeutics Inc: * INSYS THERAPEUTICS REITERATES COMMITMENT TO COMPLIANT AND ETHICAL BUSINESS PRACTICES AND ADVANCING INNOVATIVE PRODUCT PIPELINE * INSYS THERAPEUTICS - ‍ALSO CONTINUE WORKING WITH AUTHORITIES TO RESOLVE ISSUES RELATED TO “INAPPROPRIATE ACTIONS” TAKEN BY FORMER EMPLOYEES​ * INSYS THERAPEUTICS SAYS ‍LAST WEEK’S FEDERAL INDICTMENTS OF FIVE NEW YORK PHYSICIANS INVOLVE ALLEGATIONS RELATED TO FORMER EMPLOYEES​ * INSYS THERAPEUTICS INC - STATEMENT AFTER ‍LAST WEEK’S FEDERAL INDICTMENTS OF FIVE NEW YORK PHYSICIANS INVOLVE ALLEGATIONS RELATED TO FORMER EMPLOYEES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
